name: Unlucky Village
description:
Deck - building card game

Hi, adventurer!
The old witch damaged the villagers.
Do not let them die until the spell is lifted!
Neutralize events with cards.

In Simple Mode, you can use only one card to neutralize a disaster (except Tornado).
Tornado: Sun + Rain.
Plague: Death.
Fire: Rain.
Flood: Sun.
Earthquake: Earth.
Fog: Wind.

In Medium Mode you can use Combos to neutralize a disaster.
Tornado: Sun + Rain; Wind + Sun.
Plague: Death; Sun + Sun.
Fire: Rain; Wind + Earth.
Flood: Sun; Earth + Wind.
Earthquake: Earth; Rain + Wind.
Fog: Wind; Sun + Death.
